description:
President of the EG company (EG社会長); as such, founder and funder of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project]. His age must be around 48 as he was 17 back in 1997 and the TV series timeline ends in 2028.
He is also the owner of the house where http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Saiko Yuki] runs her cafe free of rent, thus he has secretly taken care of his beloved one for many years. The scar on his nose is the result of the http://anidb.net/ch26031 [Lucifer Hawk]`s attack back then.
name: Washio Tooru (old)
